meanings.sent1: The torqued rope held the swing securely in place.
meanings.sent2: The torqued screw was difficult to remove.
meanings.sent3: The torqued tree branch looked like a twisted snake.
meanings.sent4: The torqued metal bar resembled a coiled spring.
meanings.sent5: The torqued rubber band snapped back with great force.

meanings.sent1: She was torqued when her plans got canceled last minute.
meanings.sent2: He seemed torqued by the constant noise outside.
meanings.sent3: The torqued expression on her face made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His torqued mood cast a shadow over the party.
meanings.sent5: The torqued customer demanded to speak to the manager.

meanings.definition: Adjusted or tightened with a torque wrench
meanings.sent1: The torqued bolts ensured the machine's stability.
meanings.sent2: The torqued nuts were securely fastened in place.
meanings.sent3: He torqued the screws until they couldn't turn any further.
meanings.sent4: The torqued joints held the structure together firmly.
meanings.sent5: The torqued connections were crucial for the project's success.
